name: TED Radio Hour
author: NPR
description: New episodes of the TED Radio Hour will be available in March 2013. The TED Radio Hour is a journey through fascinating ideas: astonishing inventions, fresh approaches to old problems, new ways to think and create. Based on Talks given by riveting speakers on the world-renowned TED stage, each show is centered on a common theme - such as the source of happiness, crowd-sourcing innovation, power shifts, or inexplicable connections. TED Radio Hour is a co-production of NPR & TED.
